name: cribl_splunk_forwarder_windows_classic_events_to_json
author: David Maislin
description: This pack is designed to transform Splunk Windows Classic events to JSON, reduce event sizes, be compliant with the Splunk Common Information Model (CIM) and maintain backwards compatibility with the Splunk Add-on for Microsoft Windows and the Splunk Common Information Model (CIM)
displayName: Splunk Forwarder Windows Classic Events to JSON
